summary: a gang of at least three people poured gasoline on a car that stopped to fill up at california gas station early on saturday morning and set the vehicle on fire . the driver of the car , who has not been identified , said he got into an argument with the suspects while he was pumping gas at a 76 station in south los angeles around 12:15am on saturday . the group covered his white dodge charger in gasoline and lit it ablaze while there were two passengers inside .

aspect: - A group set a car on fire at a gas station in South Los Angeles
- The driver got into an argument with the suspects while pumping gas
- The group poured gasoline on the car and lit it
- The incident happened around 12:15am on Saturday morning
- The fire was lit after the suspects attempted to carjack the driver
- The car was completely ruined in the fire
- The suspects remain at large and surveillance video is being used in the investigation
explain: One of the core ideas of the given aspect is that a group of people set a car on fire at a gas station in South Los Angeles.

The aspect highlights that the driver got into an argument with the suspects while pumping gas. This implies that the crime was not a random act of violence, but rather, it was a result of a heated situation that arose between the driver and the suspects.

One of the main ideas of this aspect is that the group poured gasoline on the car that had stopped to fill up at a California gas station and set it on fire. This indicates that the intention of the group was to cause damage or harm to the vehicle and its occupants.

The given aspect is related to the time when the incident occurred. Specifically, it states that the incident happened around 12:15am on Saturday morning. This means that the event in question took place during the early hours of the morning on the day in question.

The aspect states that the fire was lit by the suspects after they attempted to carjack the driver of the vehicle. This means that the driver of the car was not initially targeted for robbery, but the suspects instead attempted to take the car by force.
The aspect highlights that the car was completely destroyed in the fire that was set by the gang.

The aspect of the situation states that the suspects involved in setting fire to the car are still at large and footage from the surveillance camera is being used by the investigators to identify them. This core idea of the aspect highlights the current state of the investigation and the efforts being put forth to apprehend the culprits involved in the crime.
